statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{4 \, x^{3} + x^{2} - 2 \, x + 2 , -2 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x - 1 , 8 \, x^{3} - 9 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x + 4 , 30 \, x^{3} - 31 \, x^{2} + 6 \, x + 15 , 20 \, x^{3} - 28 \, x^{2} + 8 \, x + 10\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
